LightningComponentBundle.description: Dashboard for visualizing Salesforce license usage, user adoption, and login activity

property.name: autoRefreshInterval
property.label: Auto Refresh Interval (minutes)
property.description: Set how often the dashboard should automatically refresh data (0 to disable)

property.name: showInactiveUsers
property.label: Show Inactive Users
property.description: Include inactive users in license counts and analytics

property.name: inactiveUserThreshold
property.label: Inactive User Threshold (days)
property.description: Number of days without login to consider a user inactive

property.name: defaultTabName
property.label: Default Tab
property.description: The tab to display when the component loads

property.name: displayMode
property.label: Display Mode
property.description: How to display the license data

property.name: enableExport
property.label: Enable Data Export
property.description: Allow exporting data to CSV and Excel formats

property.name: showDetailedApiUsage
property.label: Show Detailed API Usage
property.description: Display detailed API usage metrics per user and connected app

property.name: enableRealTimeUpdates
property.label: Enable Real-Time Updates
property.description: Enable real-time data updates using streaming API (may impact performance)
